scripts.reset: npm run clean && npm install && npm run build && npm test
scripts.repo-check: REPO_VERSION=`node -e "console.log(require('./package').version)"` && echo TAG: ctpj-intel-fox-common-v$REPO_VERSION && [[ '' == `git tag --list v${REPO_VERSION}` ]]
scripts.repo-tag: REPO_VERSION=`node -e "console.log(require('./package').version)"` && echo TAG: ctpj-intel-fox-common-v$REPO_VERSION && git add -u . && git commit -m ctpj-intel-fox-common-v$REPO_VERSION && git push && git tag ctpj-intel-fox-common-v$REPO_VERSION && git push --tags
scripts.repo-publish: npm run repo-check && npm run clean && npm install --registry https://registry.npmjs.org && npm run repo-publish-quick
scripts.repo-publish-quick: npm run repo-check && npm run build && npm run test && npm run repo-tag && npm publish --registry https://registry.npmjs.org
